meanings.definition: A group of three playing cards of the same rank.
meanings.sent1: In the game, having a prial of aces is very lucky.
meanings.sent2: She was excited to see a prial of hearts in her hand.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved making a prial of jokers disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a prial of jokers.
meanings.sent5: The prial of diamonds sparkled under the bright lights.

meanings.definition: A set of three similar things or people.
meanings.sent1: The store displayed a prial of beautiful vases in the window.
meanings.sent2: They formed a prial of friends who always stuck together.
meanings.sent3: The garden had a prial of colorful flowers that danced in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Their voices blended together like a prial of harmonizing singers.
meanings.sent5: The prial of books on the shelf caught her eye immediately.
